name: 新聞英語
description: Reading and writing news stories is not only a way to stay informed of current events, it’s also a great way to improve one’s language skills. In this two-part course, students will have a chance to practice their own news gathering and writing skills in the first two weeks under the guidance of Professor Monk, a Penn State journalism teacher and professional writer. In the second half of the course, Professor Goodwin will lead students to analyze and discuss news articles taken from the International Herald Tribune and other sources, to build reading comprehension and speaking skills.
goals: To expand on all four core skills of English, in particular reading comprehension and speaking skill.
To develop familiarity for the journalistic style.
To become aware of current events & important issues such globalization.
To provide students an opportunity to reflect on the impacts of current global and social trends.

methodologies.note: 教師帶領學生討論相關議題
教師帶領議題討論並由學生合作產生議題的看法、結論
教師及學生使用多種媒體呈現議題
教師引導學生實作專題以發掘問題並解決問題

grading.note: 包括作業、課堂活動、心得報告、小考及影音作業
依照課程要求進行課堂中之討論活動
